sect1.title: Deprecation Note
sect1.para: This device has been deprecated and moved to org.compass.spring.device.hibernate.dep package. Please use the new HibernateGpsDevice which allows for a pluggable native Hibernate extractor.

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The device is built on top of Spring ORM support for Hiberante 3, and Compass::Gps support for Hibernate 3 device. It provides support for Spring generation of Hibernate SessionFactory proxy.

sect1.title: SpringHibernate3GpsDevice
sect1.para: An extension of the Hibernate3GpsDevice that can handle Spring's proxing the Hibernate SessionFactory in order to register event listeners for real time data changes mirroring.
